game.name: Pie Attack
game.description:
You are enjoying your life calmly in a small city. But, suddenly the super bad cake villains have entered and tried to disturb the lives of common man. Even the police seem to be helpless in controlling them. The government has decided to call up the special Pie Attack force to stop the bad guys from doing their all evil deeds. You are a most important member of this force. Would you be able to perform this task now? Join Pie Attack and be prepared to take them down before they make things worse!

Common friends! You have taken the responsibility of all the civilians so there is no time to relax in this 2D fast action shooting game. The best part is that there is no violence included and, as a response, players from all ages can participate and enjoy their time. Keep your mouse and ready to shoot pies on all the enemies that you see popping up in the windows! Make sure to hit as many bad guys as possible while avoiding the good ones to score high.

Try to be extra careful while aiming your target as your single mistake can cause lose your game! Being a good man, you have the ability to make a decision on time. Unite yourself with the other good people and fight together against a horde of bad souls! Testing your speed and accuracy will help you to get success in this HTML5 shooting game! Practice first before entering the battlefield in this cool shooter challenge! Browse through our wider collection of online action-packed challenges that are free to play on atmegame.com! Have a blast!
